it.polimi.se2019.network.server

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIServer, SocketServer

    public interface Server
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A generic class used by the View to connect to remote clients
